page.title: 13Farming 7 - Cefn Coch Farm
page.content: This is a mixed dairy, arable and store cattle farm of 140 acres. Grass is grown for grazing as well as wheat, barley, tyfon for cattle foods. Cattle also eat cattle cake mixed with home milled grain. There are 4 tractors, 2 balers, 3 trailers, a topper, hedge trimmer, plough, spinners, muck spreaders, drill, a mole plough, a mower, harrow, roller, elevator and saw. Each cow has one calf per year and produces approx. 2\ gallons of milk per day. Most of the cows are raised on the farm and are Freisians for milking, and the store cattle are Hereford cross Freisians. A Hereford bull is hired for part of the year.
